mapper.select: SELECT tdp.*, o.`name` AS node_name, o.identity_id AS node_identityId, o.carrier_node_id AS node_id FROM task_data_provider AS tdp LEFT JOIN task_org AS o ON tdp.identity_id = o.identity_id WHERE trc.task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
replace into task (task_id, meta_data_id, rec_update_time, identity_id, meta_data_name) values
(#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{metaDataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{identityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{metaDataName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into task_data_provider
task_id,
meta_data_id,
rec_update_time,
#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{metaDataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{recUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update.foreach: update task_data_provider set task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meta_data_id = #{metaDataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rec_update_time = #{recUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, identity_id = #{identityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meta_data_name = #{metaDataName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and meta_data_id = #{metaDataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
